services.title: Our Services

items.title: Industrial Welding
items.shortDesc: TIG, MIG, and spot welding for high-quality metal structures
items.fullDesc: Our industrial welding expertise covers a wide range of techniques including TIG, MIG, MAG and spot welding. We work on all types of metals: steel, stainless steel, aluminum, and special alloys. Our certified welders guarantee assemblies that comply with the strictest standards.

items.title: CNC Machining
items.shortDesc: Precision machining on 3, 4 and 5-axis CNC centers
items.fullDesc: Our latest generation CNC machining centers allow the manufacture of complex parts with micron precision. From prototyping to large series, we master turning, milling and EDM.

items.title: Automation
items.shortDesc: Design and integration of automated and robotic systems
items.fullDesc: We design and integrate custom industrial automation solutions. From robotizing production lines to installing control systems, we optimize your processes for greater efficiency.

items.title: Industrial Maintenance
items.shortDesc: Preventive and corrective maintenance of your equipment
items.fullDesc: Our maintenance service ensures maximum availability of your equipment. We intervene preventively and curatively, with contracts adapted to your needs and a team available 24/7.

items.title: Engineering Office
items.shortDesc: Design and technical studies with CAD/CAM
items.fullDesc: Our engineering office supports your projects from design to completion. Our engineers use the latest CAD software to design innovative and optimized solutions.

items.title: Metal Construction
items.shortDesc: Manufacture of metal structures and frameworks
items.fullDesc: Specialists in metal construction, we produce all types of structures: frameworks, stairs, railings, walkways and industrial buildings. From design to installation, we guarantee quality and deadlines.

about.title: About Indusnov
about.subtitle: Industrial excellence for over 30 years
about.description: Founded in 1993, Indusnov has become a benchmark in the metal and mechanical industry. Our commitment to quality, innovation and customer satisfaction has enabled us to build lasting partnerships with the largest industrial players.
about.missionText: To provide innovative and sustainable industrial solutions that exceed our customers' expectations while contributing to the development of local industry.
